description: [``botocore``] This release introduces a boolean attribute ManagedByAWSBackupOnly as part of ListRecoveryPointsByResource api to filter the recovery points based on ownership. This attribute can be used to filter out the recovery points protected by AWSBackup.
[``botocore``] AWS CodeBuild now supports overflow behavior on Reserved Capacity.
[``botocore``] This release adds Hierarchy based Access Control fields to Security Profile public APIs and adds support for UserAttributeFilter to SearchUsers API.
[``botocore``] Add media accelerator and neuron device information on the describe instance types API.
[``botocore``] Support for Flink 1.18 in Managed Service for Apache Flink
[``botocore``] Adds m6i, m6id, m7i, c6i, c6id, c7i, r6i r6id, r7i, p5 instance type support to Sagemaker Notebook Instances and miscellaneous wording fixes for previous Sagemaker documentation.
[``botocore``] Removed unused parameter kmsKeyArn from UpdateDeviceRequest
